name: Messenger App - Android UI Kits
description:
Messenger App - Android UI Kits

Messenger Chat App is example implementation material design chatting app. This UI template provide developers easy way to make their own app, developer just focus on functionality and here the beautiful UI Template build with native code

What will you get?

+ Over 10+ screens

+ Documentation

+ Ready to use template code Android Studio Project

+ Clean & Minimal Design

+ Fully and easily customizable colors, spaces, layout

+ Clean and light design

+ Good Material Design

+ Ripple Effect

+ Material Drawer

+ Beauty Cardview

+ Parallax Scrollbar

+ Activity Transition Animation

+ Recycleview Animation

+ Support Multiple Screen
